modName: Konahrik Retexture - Herma Mora Dragon Word
summary: Personal re-texture for the greatest Dragon Priest Mask using element from Oghma Infinium and Dragon words.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://oi65.tinypic.com/2ltq7fa.jpg[/img][/center]

This is my first mod and I simply want to redesign Konahrik because I never find something that fix properly with my idea of the greatest mask and I always prefer the Cultist one (especially with Telvani Robes).
The main element is take from the Oghma Infinium of Hermaeus Mora and the dragon words are listed as below:

On the forehead are written
YOL - UL ( FIRE - ETERNITY)

on the mouth are written
IIZ - FO (ICE - FROST) ,
QO - STRUN (LIGHTNING - STORM)
SHUL - LAH (SUN - MAGICKA)
ZOOR - VIING ( LEGEND - WING)
GRAH-TOOR (BATTLE - INFERNO)

on the chin there is the Oblivion sign "only for increase" the conjuration-summon power of the mask.

I decided to put the dragon words only because I find so interest to put something like Dragon Shouts in the mouthless mask.

Its designed for be totally IN-SKYRIM style.

Probably will arrive also an Apocrypha version if will be a large request and the hood for both.

Any suggestion is appreciate.

Update 0.1: Fix detail on the mask.

Update0.2: Add the hood as single download. Draconic words on the hood says "Konahrik" ( Lordwar)

Here you can find the Psijic Robes retexture made with the same pattern of the hood: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34914

Credit to Bethesda for the original texture and elements.

Enjoy and FUS RO DAH
